Hero.Title: AI Assistant for Word
Hero.Description: Transform your Word workflow with AI-powered assistance. Built for privacy, seamlessly integrated into your existing Microsoft 365 environment.

Features.Title: Powerful AI Features
Features.Description: Everything you need to write better, faster, and smarter.

Chat.Title: Intelligent Chat Assistant
Chat.Description: Ask questions, get suggestions, and refine your content with AI-powered conversations directly in Word. Context-aware responses based on your document.

Templates.Title: Smart Template Fill
Templates.Description: Automatically populate templates with client data from your CRM. Generate contracts, proposals, and reports in seconds with AI-powered data extraction.

Suggestions.Title: Inline Suggestions
Suggestions.Description: Real-time writing assistance with contextual suggestions as you type. Improve tone, clarity, and style without leaving your document flow.

Actions.Title: One-Click Actions
Actions.Description: Summarize documents, translate content, adjust tone, or generate outlines with pre-configured AI actions. Customizable for your workflow.

Privacy.Title: Privacy-First Architecture
Privacy.Description: Your documents stay in your Microsoft 365 environment. All AI processing respects your data sovereignty. Swiss-hosted options available.

Integration.Title: Seamless Microsoft Integration
Integration.Description: Native authentication with Microsoft Entra ID. Works with your existing Office 365 policies and security controls. No separate login required.

Customization.Title: Tailored to Your Business
Customization.Description: Admin console to configure AI agents, manage prompts, and control features per user or team. Integrate with your CRM and internal systems.

Compliance.Title: Enterprise-Grade Compliance
Compliance.Description: Built for regulated industries. Activity logging, audit trails, and admin controls. Compliant with Swiss and EU data protection standards.

UseCases.Title: Built for Service Providers
UseCases.Description: Designed for consulting firms, legal practices, and professional services in the Lake Geneva region.

Legal.Title: Legal Practices
Legal.Description: Generate client documents, contracts, and legal correspondence. Integrate with case management systems for automatic template filling.

Consulting.Title: Consulting Firms
Consulting.Description: Create proposals, reports, and client deliverables faster. Maintain consistent branding and messaging across all documents.

Finance.Title: Financial Services
Finance.Description: Produce compliance reports, client communications, and financial analyses. Ensure accuracy with AI-powered fact-checking.

Pricing.Title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
Pricing.Description: Choose the plan that fits your team size and needs.
Pricing.Contact: Contact us for enterprise pricing and custom deployment options.

CTA.Title: Ready to Transform Your Word Workflow?
CTA.Description: Get started with a free trial or schedule a demo to see how AI can enhance your document creation process.
